item.title: PsychedelicArtwork
item.description: /c/PsychedelicArtwork on psychedelia.ink [home] [/c/psychedelic_artwork ðŸŒŽ] [psychedelia.ink] Description A place to share psychedelic art, art that inspires a sense of spirituality or mysticism, or just trippy stuff; whether you made it, or someone else did. **RULES**: 1. If you didn't make the art you are sharing please credit the artist. **ARTISTS' LINKS**: * [Adam Scott Miller](http://adam-scott-miller.deviantart.com/) * [Alex Grey](http://alexgrey.com/art/) * [Amanda Sage](http://amandasage.com/) * [Andrei Verner](http://andreiverner.com/blog/inspiration/psychedelic-drawings-of-shiptushaboo/) * [Andrew Norris](https://andrewnorrisarts.com/) * [Android Jones](http://androidjones.
